name: CAMEL (Communicative Agents for 'Mind' Exploration of Large Scale Language Model Society)
summary:

A synthetic dataset of 20,000 physics problem-solution pairs generated using GPT-4.
notes: The dataset encompasses 25 physics topics, each with 25 subtopics, containing 32 problems per subtopic. Generated by GPT-4 without verification for correctness; users should independently validate content before use.
